title: Pakistan grieved over Nepal flood losses
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 29 (APP):Pakistan on Sunday expressed profound sadness and sorrow over the loss of lives and devastation caused by the heavy rains and flash floods in Nepal.
“Our thoughts and prayers are with all who have lost loved ones and livelihood in the floods.
Pakistan stands in solidarity with the government and people of Nepal in this moment of tragedy,” a brief statement issued by the Foreign Office spoeksperson said.
